page.title: 13HOUSING.
page.content: Housing is mainly privately owned but there used to be six council houses,most of them have now been sold There are roughly seventy houses in Mathon rural area and about 350 people altogether.Many people are retired and some commute to work elsewhere.Many houses are quite large farmsteads. Being a widespread rural area,crime is very unlikely and the only policeman in the area lives in Cradley and looks after Mathons interests. When we went round Mathon we saw lots of old barns and some lovely black and white houses.All these houses are in a lovely area which makes them very desireable.There are some modern estate houses as well but they are not so pretty.
